item.title: The renegade Kautsky
item.description: I’ve been reading Mike Macnair’s Revolutionary Strategy: Marxism and the challenge of left unity, and it occurred to me there is a whole world out there of ideas and topics that could be helped by more formal analysis, and by that I mean a more rigorous approach to quantify the outcomes of each topic, the parameters that would go in it and the debates that it would spark. As a start, one can take the the erfurt programme and start doing a formal/data science analysis on each constituent part of the programme.
